name: test_e2e_with_logs[088_XSS_BYPASS_009]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_BYPASS_009` |
| **Name** | iframe srcdoc injection |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<iframe srcdoc='<script>alert(1)</script>'>`
- **Encoded**: `%3Ciframe%20srcdoc%3D'%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C%2Fscript%3E'%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~31000ms
- **Timestamp**: 06:21:32.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
